plot: Siran is a teenager Armenian girl in Spain. In spite of her physical difficulties as a result of an accident, she uses all her spare time to help in the integration of foreign children.
title: Los ojos de Siran
plot_es: Siran is a teenager Armenian girl in Spain. In spite of her physical difficulties as a result of an accident, she uses all her spare time to help in the integration of foreign children.
plot_en: Siran is a teenager Armenian girl in Spain. In spite of her physical difficulties as a result of an accident, she uses all her spare time to help in the integration of foreign children.
